mapper.select: select a.company_no , b.company_name , a.contract_no , a.contract_name , a.contract_date , a.contractor , a.contract_period , a.start_date , a.end_date , a.monetary_unit , a.exchange_rate , a.amount , a.discounted_amount , a.actual_amount , a.remark from contract as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where a.company_no = #{companyNo};

select a.company_no , b.company_name , a.contract_no , a.contract_name , a.contract_date , a.contractor , a.contract_period , a.start_date , a.end_date , a.monetary_unit , a.exchange_rate , a.amount , a.discounted_amount , a.actual_amount , a.remark from contract as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where a.company_no = #{companyNo} and a.contract_no = #{contractNo};

select company_no , contract_no , license_no , license_type , app_name , license_count , start_date , end_date , unit_price , amount , discounted_amount , actual_amount from license where company_no = #{companyNo} and contract_no = #{contractNo};
